Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Greg McHale's Wild Yukon
programme.desc: Greg battles against the terrain and closes in on a beautiful ram; will it be another once in a lifetime kill or just another ram?

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures
programme.desc: Steve West takes us through the history of the Burris Eliminator scopes and all of his favorite hunts.

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: The Western Hunter documents the journeys of public land hunters out West. The stories unfold in some of the most wild and beautiful settings on the continent in pursuit of big game.

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason joins his good friend Tom Petry for an elk hunt in the Colorado high country.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Spear-fishing champion and chef Kim Werner hosts Steven and Cal on a dive off the Kona coast of Hawaii that results in a feast of seafood delicacies.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Biologist and conservationist Robert Abernethy guides Steven on a successful wild turkey hunt in the challenging swamps of South Carolina.

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: A few lucky fans hunt hogs with Pigman during Shankfest.

programme.title: Beyond the Bar With Josh and Shasta
programme.desc: It's Thanksgiving and the road crew is headed to hunt Oklahoma and Texas for the third year in a row.

programme.title: Adventures of Chapo Gringo
programme.desc: Follow our fearless host, Robert Beall, aka 'Chapo Gringo', as he guides you through heart-pounding escapades across the globe in search of thrilling hunts and unparalleled experiences. In each episode, Robert immerses viewers in breathtaking landscapes while sharing his passion for the outdoors. With his charismatic personality and quick wit, Robert ensures non-stop entertainment and laughter throughout.

programme.title: Gun Stories
programme.desc: The gun that nearly beat out the Colt 1911.

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Featuring odd, unique guns of the Old West.

programme.title: Heroes Ranch
programme.desc: Marine Corps veteran Shon steps into the wild, hunting a giant buck while rediscovering brotherhood and resilience.

programme.title: Dirt Trax TV
programme.desc: Dirt Trax TV is the trusted source North American ATV and UTV enthusiasts turn to for Test Ride reviews of todays most popular off-road vehicles. Fans of Dirt Trax TV are also treated to detailed in-shop technical mods and maintenance features along with travel guides showcasing popular off-road destinations.

programme.title: Handguns
programme.desc: How to help new shooters get off to a good start.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Spear-fishing champion and chef Kim Werner hosts Steven and Cal on a dive off the Kona coast of Hawaii that results in a feast of seafood delicacies.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Biologist and conservationist Robert Abernethy guides Steven on a successful wild turkey hunt in the challenging swamps of South Carolina.

In each episode, Robert immerses viewers in breathtaking landscapes while sharing his passion for the outdoors. programme.title: Gun Stories
programme.desc: The gun that nearly beat out the Colt 1911.

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Featuring odd, unique guns of the Old West.

programme.title: Heroes Ranch
programme.desc: Marine Corps veteran Shon steps into the wild, hunting a giant buck while rediscovering brotherhood and resilience.

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Join the team in Kansas as they chase waterfowl.

programme.title: Huntworx
programme.desc: Kasey and Seth head into the Missouri woods with one goal-put a buck on the ground.

programme.title: Texas Strong
programme.desc: Nothing stops us from chasing free-range elk with 1900 feeds, even an equipment malfunction!

programme.title: Dead Meat
programme.desc: Leysath teams up with Puerto Rico's iguana hunters to reduce the population explosion of invasive iguanas on the island.

programme.title: Whitetail Properties
programme.desc: Montana flat lander elk hunt under a full moon.

programme.title: Haymaker Hunting
programme.desc: King travels to Sonora Mexico with Mesquite Mountain Outfitters and John Brennan with NWTF to get their first Gould's turkey.

programme.title: Crossroads With the Burtons
programme.desc: The Burtons' friends from Timber Creek visit Virginia for a week of exciting hunts.

programme.title: RNT-V
programme.desc: John and crew chase snow geese around the Grand Prairie of Arkansas.

programme.title: Art of wild
programme.desc: Nick rolls the dice going into new territory in search of a mule deer in Utah.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Dave takes his daughter, Allie, to Small Town Hunts in Kansas, for her first ever archery hunt; an unseasonable heat wave plagues it; when spring turkey season rolls around, she makes it look way too easy!

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: A few lucky fans hunt hogs with Pigman during Shankfest.

programme.title: Elk Camp
programme.desc: Steve Chappell guides Zero Hunt Fees Member Chris Griego to a big herd bull.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's: The Professionals
programme.desc: The second season of reindeer hunting at the End of the World.

programme.title: Dropped
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of the second cache.

programme.title: Hoge Wild
programme.desc: Lucas Hoge, Bill Petrus, David Hansen and Randy Harden team up to take a wounded-in-action retired state trooper on a gator hunt for the first Hoge Wild Hero Hunt.

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Montana consistently proves successful but this hunt Melissa and Lance change things up a bit!

programme.title: In Fisherman TV
programme.desc: The quest is to become one with the predatory fish we seek, as the In-Fisherman staff goes into action for early season largemouth bass on a frenzy for blade jigs; rendezvous with early season smallmouths pushing shallower while walleyes are pushing deeper; and explores factors for giant blue cats in the unique environment that is the extreme lower Mississippi River.

programme.title: Let's Fish TV
programme.desc: This week's episode features Let's Fish anchor Andrew Upshaw fishing for team USA in Mexico.

programme.title: Final Draw
programme.desc: Oklahoma is in the sights of the crew as both Carson and Richard see what the state holds.

programme.title: MOJO TV
programme.desc: Terry meets up with Ramsey Russell for a ridiculous pigeon hunt in Argentina.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild
programme.desc: In Kenya, former UFC Champion Luke Rockhold faces up with the Maasal warriors, and tests himself with Mario before going into the deep wilderness to discover an animal that eludes them and then re-appears.

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Ryan Whitaker may be a big buck magnet; giant bucks seems to show up anywhere he goes.

programme.title: Adrenaline
programme.desc: The Midwest rut lights up as we dive into high-stakes encounters, rut-driven movement and the calculated risks it takes to put a mature whitetail on the ground.

programme.title: Dropped
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of the second cache.

programme.title: Inside F1

programme.title: Inside F1
programme.desc: Saison 1Épisode 10: George Russell Les étoiles se sont alignées pour la jeune pousse britannique George Russell à partir de 2022, avec son arrivée tant attendue et inévitable au sommet de la F1, grâce à un contrat de travail avec les champions du monde en titre, Mercedes. moins

programme.title: Chill
programme.desc: De l'action incroyable dans les Alpes suisses, au coeur d'un hiver spectaculaire. Première étape, la station de Leysin où les meilleurs snowboarders de la planète s'affrontent pour les Nescafe Champs. Et Engadin Snow est un festival en Suisse qui ne ressemble à aucun autre. moins

programme.desc: De Luka Modric, qui a remporté la Champions League à plusieurs reprises, à Bobby Charlton, en passant par Andres Iniesta, le décompte des meilleurs milieux de terrain. moins

Posers like Mom and Dad might find these freewheeling goofballs a bit sketchy, but their teenage kids will be stoked.

programme.title: Springfield Rifle
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Union forces stationed in Colorado are hampered by raiders who have been stealing their horses as they travel through the mountains. When several commanding officers begin to suspect a traitor is revealing troop movements, Maj. Lex Kearny (Gary Cooper) goes undercover to investigate. However, the assignment strains Kearny's relationship with his wife, Erin (Phyllis Thaxter), after he chooses to continue the operation instead of searching for their runaway son.

programme.title: The Woman in the Window
programme.desc: His family packed off to Maine, Professor Richard Wanley (Edward G. Robinson) is anticipating some quiet time alone. Then he meets Alice (Joan Bennett), the model for a portrait he admires, and can't resist her offer of a drink. No sooner do they get to her place, however, than her jealous boyfriend arrives in a rage. Richard kills him in self-defense, and they decide to hide the body. Things go smoothly until Richard's D.A. friend invites him to tag along on the investigation of his own crime.

programme.title: Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: Private eye Phillip Marlowe (Robert Montgomery) wants to get out of the detective racket and into crime writing. But when he's called to the office of editor Adrienne Fromsett (Audrey Totter), it's not to talk about his story ideas -- she wants him to locate the missing wife of her boss, Mr. Kingsby (Leon Ames). The assignment quickly becomes complicated when bodies start turning up. This Raymond Chandler adaptation is notable for being filmed entirely from Marlowe's first-person perspective.

programme.title: The Night Holds Terror
programme.desc: Three hitchhikers hold a factory worker (Jack Kelly) and his family for ransom after they determine his father is very wealthy.

programme.title: Saturday Afternoon
programme.desc: Harry tries to sneak away from his domineering wife for an afternoon of fun.

programme.title: Law of the Canyon
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his sidekick (Smiley Burnette) bust a frontier protection racket.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Bandit Queen
programme.desc: A young woman (Barbara Britton) becomes a masked avenger after gold-grabbers kill her Spanish parents in old California.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp and Bat work together to help Bat win an election for county sheriff to defeat Jerry Lanphere, a crook also running for the position; Sen. Drew tells Bat he must end his friendship with Earp to gain the people's favor.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp has 24 hours to find a killer after a judge sentences an innocent man to hang, but the man refuses to speak in his own defense, leaving Earp with few clues to follow.

programme.title: The Woman in the Window
programme.desc: His family packed off to Maine, Professor Richard Wanley (Edward G. Robinson) is anticipating some quiet time alone. Then he meets Alice (Joan Bennett), the model for a portrait he admires, and can't resist her offer of a drink. No sooner do they get to her place, however, than her jealous boyfriend arrives in a rage. Richard kills him in self-defense, and they decide to hide the body. Things go smoothly until Richard's D.A. friend invites him to tag along on the investigation of his own crime.

programme.title: Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: Private eye Phillip Marlowe (Robert Montgomery) wants to get out of the detective racket and into crime writing. But when he's called to the office of editor Adrienne Fromsett (Audrey Totter), it's not to talk about his story ideas -- she wants him to locate the missing wife of her boss, Mr. Kingsby (Leon Ames). The assignment quickly becomes complicated when bodies start turning up. This Raymond Chandler adaptation is notable for being filmed entirely from Marlowe's first-person perspective.

programme.title: The Night Holds Terror
programme.desc: Three hitchhikers hold a factory worker (Jack Kelly) and his family for ransom after they determine his father is very wealthy.

programme.title: Sierra Passage
programme.desc: An orphan turns minstrel-show sharpshooter (Wayne Morris) and aims for his father's killer (Alan Hale Jr.).

programme.title: The Wyoming Kid
programme.desc: Slick gambler James Wylie (Dennis Morgan) is apprehended by the law and given the option to forgo a prison sentence if he poses as a bandit. His mission is to uncover the identity of the Poet, a notorious outlaw who has been holding up bank-owned stagecoaches and leaving verses at the crime scenes to taunt the authorities. James finds time to woo the Poet's lovely wife, Ann (Jane Wyman), who initially cold-shoulders him. But, as a romance develops, they partner up to find the robber.

programme.title: The Lady From Shanghai
programme.desc: A rich lawyer (Everett Sloane) and his seductive wife (Rita Hayworth) frame an Irish sailor (Orson Welles) for murder.

programme.title: Cash on Demand
programme.desc: A British banker (Peter Cushing) pretends to cooperate with a would-be robber (Andre Morell) holding his wife and son.

programme.title: To the Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: A U.S. narcotics agent (Dick Powell) tracks an opium cartel out to rule the world.

programme.title: Killer Dill
programme.desc: A mild-mannered lingerie salesman's efforts to please his girlfriend put him in league with underworld henchmen.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: To the Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: A U.S. narcotics agent (Dick Powell) tracks an opium cartel out to rule the world.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Bounty hunters stir up trouble in Dodge City by trying to collect rewards on reformed outlaws until Earp devises a plan to turn the bounty hunters against each other.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A headstrong teenager named Jimmy Craig arrives in Dodge City and wants to become one of Earp's deputies, demonstrating his impeccable skill with a gun, but his dream contrasts sharply with his irrational obsession to duel Ed Beatty.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp takes Bat's brother Ed under his wing as a new deputy, but while Ed believes outlaws can be reasoned with, Bat knows better; two businessmen plan to kill Ed and frame Bat for the crime to secure ownership of a saloon.

programme.title: Cash on Demand
programme.desc: A British banker (Peter Cushing) pretends to cooperate with a would-be robber (Andre Morell) holding his wife and son.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: The Wyoming Kid
programme.desc: An outlaw's wife (Jane Wyman) falls for a gambler (Dennis Morgan) who is working as a Wells Fargo detective.

programme.title: Gunfighters
programme.desc: A gunfighter (Randolph Scott) turns cowhand and then back again, fighting a cattle baron with two daughters (Barbara Britton, Dorothy Hart).

programme.title: The Brothers Rico
programme.desc: A businessman (Richard Conte) tries to warn his gangster brothers about a syndicate plot to kill them.

programme.title: Framed
programme.desc: A banker's (Barry Sullivan) mistress (Janis Carter) frames a mining engineer (Glenn Ford) to take the fall for an embezzlement.

programme.title: Impact
programme.desc: A declared-dead man (Brian Donlevy) hides out with a widow (Ella Raines) after his wife and her lover botch his murder.

programme.title: The Phantom Express
programme.desc: Railroad foes cause terror on the tracks with the illusion of a ghost train.

programme.title: The Lonesome Trail
programme.desc: A group of conniving land-grabbers is deterred from further evil by a Western Robin Hood armed with a bow and arrow.

programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: Riders of the Badlands
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger's uncanny resemblance to a wanted outlaw results in his own arrest by a fellow lawman.

programme.title: Ministry - Your Words Have Power with Joyce Meyer
programme.desc: Your words hold incredible power; today, Joyce reveals how the things you say can impact your life in profound ways.

programme.title: Word of God Ministries
programme.desc: Pastor James McMenis and his wife Chrissy are dedicated to winning the lost to Jesus and making disciples of the saved. Their goal is to bring clarity to the Word of God, making it life-applicable to people everywhere.

programme.title: The Catholic Mass
programme.desc: The Heart of the nation Sunday mass brings the beauty and traditions of the Catholic faith.

programme.title: Perry Stone
programme.desc: Religious teachings from Perry Stone.

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Brothers Rico
programme.desc: Former Mafia bookkeeper Eddie Rico (Richard Conte) has decided to go straight and lives with his wife in Florida, where they plan to adopt a child. However, his brothers, Johnny (James Darren) and Gino (Paul Picerni), still work for his ex-boss, Sid Kubik (Larry Gates) -- and, when Eddie finds out their lives are in danger, he tries to re-establish his connection to the world he thought he had left behind. But when one of his brothers is killed, Eddie realizes that he may be next.

programme.title: Framed
programme.desc: Truck driver Mike Lambert (Glenn Ford) is a down-and-out mining engineer searching for a job. When his rig breaks down in a small town, he happens upon Paula Craig (Janis Carter), a venomous seductress. When Craig's boyfriend, Steve Price (Barry Sullivan), robs a bank, they intend to frame Lambert, but Craig murders Price, takes the money and convinces Lambert that he killed Price in a blackout. Lambert is ready to skip town, until he learns a friend is set to take the fall.

programme.title: Riders of the Badlands
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger's uncanny resemblance to a wanted outlaw results in his own arrest by a fellow lawman.

programme.title: Gunfighters
programme.desc: In Texas, gunfighter Brazos Kane (Randolph Scott) decides to lay down his guns for good and rides out to visit his best friend -- only to witness his murder. When Brazos takes the body to the nearby ranch of the powerful Banner (Griff Barnett), the rancher accuses him of the murder. Brazos leaves Banner's daughter, Bess (Barbara Britton), a vital piece of evidence in the crime, and then must evade Banner and a crooked sheriff as he reluctantly takes up arms to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Tall in the Saddle
programme.desc: Cowboy Rocklin (John Wayne) rides into a dusty western township where he's been promised work on a ranch. But when he finds that his future boss has been gunned down, he's forced to find work elsewhere. Despite his sexist attitudes, Rocklin charms the fiery Arly (Ella Raines) with his cavalier bravado and lands a job at her family's ranch. There, however, he learns that Judge Garvey (Ward Bond) was involved in his original employer's murder and is now trying to steal the dead man's land.

programme.title: The Big Sleep
programme.desc: Private investigator Philip Marlowe (Humphrey Bogart) is hired by General Sternwood to help resolve the gambling debts of his wild young daughter, Carmen (Martha Vickers). Sternwood's older daughter, Vivian (Lauren Bacall), provides assistance when she implies that the situation is more complex, and also involves casino owner (John Ridgely) and a recently disappeared family friend. As people linked to the Sternwoods start being murdered, Marlowe finds himself getting ever deeper into the case.

programme.title: Key Largo
programme.desc: This classic film noir by John Huston stars Humphrey Bogart as World War II vet Frank McCloud. Visiting Key Largo to pay his respects to the family of his late war buddy, McCloud attempts to comfort his comrade's widow, Nora (Lauren Bacall), and father, James Temple (Lionel Barrymore), who operate a hotel. But McCloud realizes that mobsters, led by the infamous Johnny Rocco (Edward G. Robinson), are staying in the hotel. When the criminals take over the establishment, conflict is inevitable.

programme.title: The Garment Jungle
programme.desc: New York garment factory owner Walter Mitchell (Lee J. Cobb) goes the extra, deceitful mile in battling his employees' efforts to unionize. He hires gangster Artie Ravage (Richard Boone) to interfere with the grassroots efforts. After Mitchell's son, Alan (Kerwin Matthews), returns from Europe and befriends one of the union organizers (Robert Loggia), Mitchell eventually tries to mend his unethical ways. Unfortunately, this does not sit well with the violent, vengeful Ravage.

programme.title: Whistle Stop
programme.desc: After living for years in Chicago, Mary (Ava Gardner) travels back to the tiny hamlet where she grew up. There she reconnects with her old flame, the hapless Kenny (George Raft), and discovers that, in the years since they last met, he has developed a crippling gambling addiction. When debonair hotelier Lew (Tom Conway) takes an interest in Mary, she welcomes the successful man's advances -- only to find herself trapped between two jealous suitors who would kill for her.

programme.title: The Woman in Green
programme.desc: When a number of attractive women are found dead and with fingers missing, Sherlock Holmes (Basil Rathbone) and Dr. Watson (Nigel Bruce) investigate. Though evidence points to a psychotic killer, Holmes begins to believe that there's more to the case than initially meets the eye, a notion that leads him to uncover the involvement of his archenemy, Professor Moriarty (Henry Daniell). Who is working with Moriarty on such a dastardly plot and what are their motives?

programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid in Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Duncan Renaldo) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) free a girl (Gwen Kenyon) accused of murder, then find the killer.

programme.title: Tall in the Saddle
programme.desc: Cowboy Rocklin (John Wayne) rides into a dusty western township where he's been promised work on a ranch. Despite his sexist attitudes, Rocklin charms the fiery Arly (Ella Raines) with his cavalier bravado and lands a job at her family's ranch. There, however, he learns that Judge Garvey (Ward Bond) was involved in his original employer's murder and is now trying to steal the dead man's land.

programme.title: Colorado Territory
programme.desc: Outlaw Wes McQueen (Joel McCrea) escapes from jail and travels to a meeting with his old partner-in-crime Dave Rickard (Basil Ruysdael). En route, McQueen dispatches a gang of bandits who try to rob the stagecoach and, in the process, wins the attentions of a young woman (Dorothy Malone) with whom he'd like to settle down. Convinced by Rickard to do one last heist, he finds out that his fellow henchmen are not to be trusted and the woman he truly loves is an ex-saloon girl (Virginia Mayo).

programme.title: The Blue Dahlia
programme.desc: A war veteran mixes it up with gangsters and gun molls while searching for the man who murdered his unfaithful wife.

programme.title: Sirocco
programme.desc: A gunrunner (Humphrey Bogart) gets caught in the middle with a French colonel's (Lee J. Cobb) mistress (Märta Torén) in 1925 Syria.

programme.title: Madeleine
programme.desc: Upper-class Madeleine Smith (Ann Todd) stands trial for killing her French lover (Ivan Desny) in Victorian Scotland.

programme.title: He Walked by Night
programme.desc: Los Angeles police officers (Scott Brady, Roy Roberts) hunt a devious killer thief (Richard Basehart) who monitors their frequency.

programme.title: Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Harry leaves home to become a doctor but winds up with "Doc" Healy's medicine show.

programme.title: Gunsmoke

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: The son and daughter of feuding homesteaders fall in love, with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Elkhorn

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt arrests a man for murder and finds himself the target of a gunman hired by the accused man's brother.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A gambler uses a mentally disabled man as a pawn when Matt exposes him as a cheat.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: The wagon train passengers put one of their company on trial for murder.

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: Steve decides to romance a woman (Ruta Lee) from his past in order to clear her name; guest Mark Richman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The young son of a neighboring rancher is seriously hurt in an accident.

programme.title: The High Chaparral

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: When Slim saves the life of a young Arapaho woman targeted by the Cady brothers, she insists that she belongs to Slim thenceforth.

programme.desc: Trust God for your breakthrough. Enter into powerful worship! Join us for Campmeeting.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Two reporters from New York incite a Pawnee uprising to get a good story.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt meets a boy on the prairie who claims that his father has been kidnapped.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: A buckskin-clad girl (Kathryn Walsh) leads Boone to a lost colony of settlers in a valley feared by Indians.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: Boone fights a dishonest boatman (Leif Erickson) and Shawnee to deliver gunpowder to Boonesborough.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: Slim and Jess hope to sell horses to the stage line and collect the extra money offered, so Jess goes in search of horses to sell.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne must recover two women kidnapped by Kiowas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A boy is accused of shooting an outlaw in the back.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark help a friend who has been cheated in a horse trade.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Buck is faced with a dilemma when a new hand he hired, who is Billy Blue's idol, is nothing but a thief.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: An Army lieutenant is determined to have revenge on the Indian tribe responsible for his father's death, despite the fact they now want peace.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: A woman finally learns the truth about her son that she hasn't seen in 10 years. Guest star: Agnes Moorehead. With Ward Bond and Robert Horton.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt catches the killer in Mexico, but is ambushed by bandits on the way back to the border.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: Jess is put to the test when he is asked by the Army to hunt down a thief who's stolen a payroll delivery -- but the thief is an old friend who once saved Jess' life.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: The influence of a young girl changes the life of a disillusioned Confederate officer; with Ward Bond and Robert Horton.

programme.title: Into the Wild Frontier
programme.desc: In his first year on the frontier, Jim Bridger is forced to weigh his morals against the harsh realities of survival; as Arikara warriors close in, he must choose between staying with a dying man and risking certain death -- or fleeing to safety.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The portrait traces him from Southern boy to Western lawman (Kevin Costner) defending boomtowns with his brothers and Doc Holliday (Dennis Quaid).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A convict is released from prison and returns home to North Fork.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Don Sebastian wants to seal the alliance by marrying his daughter, Victoria, to John and sending his son with her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The North Fork schoolteacher is pressured to leave town because of her progressive ideas.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: A miner closed down by Apache raids ignores John's objections and hires a bounty hunter.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: When his horse is stolen while he's on the trail, Jess tracks the horse and the thief to a village, where he contacts the sheriff, but is stunned when the youth is given a death sentence for the crime.

programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The daughter of a prosperous rancher is found murdered.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Shotgun man John Beaumont, who Lucas sent to prison, returns with vengeance on his mind.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Manolito and Buck's practical joke -- having Billy Blue sworn in as a deputy -- backfires when the real sheriff must leave.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Attacking bandits strand Buck in the desert and force kidnapped Victoria to work as a cantina hostess in an outlaw town.

programme.title: Blood Alley
programme.desc: Chinese villagers free a merchant marine captain (John Wayne) from the communists to take them to Hong Kong in a stern-wheeler.

programme.title: Rio Lobo
programme.desc: Cord McNally searches for the two traitors whose treachery causes the loss of a dear friend and the defeat of McNally's unit.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A widow swears to avenge the death of her husband who was killed in a gunfight with Matt.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt goes across the prairie unarmed to get help when a fall paralyzes Cale.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A trapper searches for his former partner, who left him for dead to save his own life.

programme.title: The Glory Guys
programme.desc: A cavalry officer (Tom Tryon) and a frontier scout (Harve Presnell) vie for a woman (Senta Berger) and try to survive a general's orders.

programme.title: Gunless
programme.desc: An American gunslinger is unable to find someone to duel in a Canadian town where no one understands the brutal code of the American Wild West.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: A man running from a posse returns to Laramie hoping to win back his wife and daughter, claiming he's reformed, though he is not what he seems.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: A stolen horse leads Slim to a war between squatters and cattlemen in the high country.

programme.title: Campmeeting
programme.desc: With Dr. Mike Murdock.

programme.title: Mike Murdock - School of Wisdom
programme.desc: Biblical principles of wisdom that help individuals face life's successes.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: Forgotten Jews
programme.desc: Join the International Fellowship of Christians and Jes to east suffering of elderly Jews in war-torn Ukraine and provide a survival food box. Save Holocaust survivors who can't afford both food and medicine.

programme.title: RateEscape: Stop Overpaying For Cellular
programme.desc: Cut up to HALF the cost of your monthly cell phone bill. Same Towers. Same Coverage. But a LOT less money. It sounds great but is it too good to be true? Join myth-busting legend Kari Byron as she takes on Big Wireless to save you money.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: A father takes a soldier hostage to force British troops to free his rebel son.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Indians take Matt captive while he is trailing a suspected gunrunner.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt concocts a plan to prevent a man from being lynched in a corrupt town.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is suspicious when a saloon girl falls in love with a man who recently inherited a ranch.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt must stop a buffalo hunter who would rather kill his hired help than pay their wages.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: A man interrupts a murder and robbery, and makes the most out of his moment of celebrity at Slim's expense.

programme.title: The Big Country

programme.title: The Verdict With Judge Hatchett
programme.desc: Judge Glenda Hatchett presided over her self-titled courtroom show from 2000-2008. Now, she returns to the medium with "The Verdict." In the half-hour series, the Atlanta native and former juvenile-court judge rules over small-claims cases brought in front of her. Hatchett's courtroom isn't just about finding someone guilty, though. She also uses her experience dealing with young people and her tough-love approach to help send a message to out-of-control juvenile offenders to try to set them on the right track in their lives.

programme.title: Supreme Justice With Judge Karen

As usual with court shows, cases involve friendships gone bad, money disputes and property damage.

programme.title: REV - Why are used cars in Venezuela a thriving industry?
programme.desc: In Venezuela demand for second-hand vehicles is huge, and they are even used as investments -- a hedge against inflation so voracious it makes no sense to park money in a bank account. "Only in Venezuela can the price of used cars go up," said a man as he leaned against a 1995 Ford Lariat he wants to sell at a tidy profit of 8,000 bolivars, or 1,860 dollars, after owning it for three months.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: Could traffic jams be minimized even as more vehicles hit streets? Can a new inflatable vest protect motorcyclists better from injuries in accidents? Is climate-friendlier flight possible? And: How a helicopter flew missions in the thin air of Mars.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Crossing a Glacier With 1,400 Sheep
programme.desc: Shepherds have been crossing the Alps with their animals for 6,000 years. That means climbing 3,000 meters in altitude, all while crossing rivers and a glacier. Called "transhumance," the seasonal movement of livestock is now world cultural heritage.

programme.title: In Good Shape
programme.desc: Researchers estimate some 50,000 plants could have medicinal properties. In Good Shape takes a look at some of the best-known ones. What do scientists have to say about the properties of mint, sage or ginger? And what remedies can you use at home?

programme.title: By Train to Hudson Bay
programme.desc: Anyone who wants to travel overland from Winnipeg to Churchill has to take the train. Only one track leads through Canadas tundra to Hudson Bay. Theres only one thing for passengers to do - relax, unwind and admire the wild beauty of the landscape through the carriage window.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: From abductions, torture and detention, freedom of speech is on the decline. What was once a social media rant, or a harmless protest has now become a risk of losing ones life. In this episode we explore the fate of ordinary citizens who dare to question those in power. For Tanzanias political is the country entering a new era of repression?

programme.title: Not One Less
programme.desc: Every year in Mexico, thousands of women are killed simply because they are women. Femicide rates in the country are among the highest in the world. Authorities often turn a blind eye, allowing perpetrators to go unpunished. But resistance is growing.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman's mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a blue-eyed Apache now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Herman's mother to uncover the real story of the blue-eyed Apache.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S4 E1 The Jud Steele Story A posse pursues Jud Steele, a wanted gunslinger, and his partner. They join the wagon train to rest their horses. Steele dies trying to steal fresh horses. Hawks returns his belongings to the sheriff, who says Steele died five years ago.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E17 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Gamble Cheyenne helps an old friend by helping her keep her saloon from crooked gamblers. The woman's daughter who has been back east in school, will be arriving back in town soon, but she knows nothing about how her mother earned money for her education.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Avenger Hoss and Joe desperately look for a way to prevent brothers Adam and Ben from being hanged for a crime. A stranger, Lassiter, comes to town in an attempt to find the truth and prove Adam and Ben's innocence.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E10 Generations to Come Booger and Bubba struggle to keep up with ranch work while Cody is busy with his specialty cattle sale. Much to Bubba's chagrin, Booger hires their ornery old hand Billy to pick up the slack. Cody manages to pack the sale barn with potential buyers, but will they open their wallets for the high-end cattle? Bubba and Kaley turn their dining room into a playroom for their expanding family. Booger begins collecting old stories and memories from Grandma to accompany the recipes in her cowboy cookbook.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E11 Let It Ripp The cowboys are busy processing cattle and preparing for an important shipment when a chute gets stuck, bringing work to a halt and risking time and money they can't afford to lose. Booger trains a cutting horse and enters it into its first competition. Cody organizes a campout for the youth at the Alabama Sheriff's Boys Ranch, and the guys share some of their cowboy wisdom with the hope of inspiring another generation to follow the cowboy way. Friends and family gather for a baby shower, where Bubba and Kaley reveal the name they've chosen for their new addition.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Visitor A pretty young widow named Ann Dodd passes through North Fork on her way to claim her inheritance. She and Lucas are immediately attracted to each other, but danger awaits as other heirs try to take Ann's life to get the inheritance for themselves.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Great Train Robbery Bat Masterson, former gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the story behind one of the country's greatest train robberies. Although Butch and Sundance are long gone, Masterson tracks down Sundance's former girlfriend, Etta Place, to draw out more details. To pull off the audacious robbery, they used official Union Pacific lanterns to signal the train and fool the engineer into believing a bridge was out. As Etta reluctantly relives the events of the robbery and its aftermath, it's obvious that she is still smitten by Sundance after all of these years.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman's mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a blue-eyed Apache now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes' guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes' adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E6 Bass Reeves: Trailblazing Lawman After escaping the bonds of slavery, Bass Reeves takes refuge among the indigenous people of The Indian Territory, where he is welcomed into their culture. When the Civil War ends, his new-found tracking skills and fluency in native languages lead to his appointment as the first Black Deputy U.S. Marshal west of the Mississippi River. Though he faces discrimination from his peers, Reeves earns their respect when he accepts Judge Isaac Parker's daunting order to hunt down one of the most ruthless killers in The Indian Territory and bring him back dead or alive. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Judge Parker to learn more about the amazing career of Bass Reeves, who goes on to arrest 3,000 felons, kill 14 men in self-defense, and complete 32 years of service without being wounded.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S5 E1 Alias Bill Hawks Bill Hawks rides into a prairie town looking for his old Indian friend, but soon realizes he is not welcome. He discovers that the townspeople are drilling a well on his friend's land and won't give him any information on his whereabouts.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: When a tough, veteran United States marshal is sent to clean up a down-and-dirty Western town, he faces a scheme to remove his authority and ruin his reputation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E5 Desert Justice When a U.S. Marshal arrests one of the Ponderosa's workers for murder and takes him to Los Angeles for trial, Hoss and Adam go to make sure the marshal doesn't kill the accused before they get there.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Stranger An inspector comes from New Orleans to Virginia City intending to arrest Ben Cartwright for a murder committed 20 years ago. Ben now must travel to New Orleans to stand trial and considers withdrawing from the governor's race.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E10 Jim Roberts Cleans Up Jerome In his first week on the job as the new constable of Jerome, Arizona, Jim Roberts gets to work arresting the town's troublemakers and teaching his timid deputy how to be a courageous lawman as they track down a stone-cold killer and his gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E12 One Way Ticket While traveling by train to Denver with prisoner Cole Younger, Cheyenne runs into problems. Friends of Younger try to free him by kidnapping the brakeman, and a beautiful widow and her son distract Cheyenne along the way.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: S3 E1 The Malachi Hobart Story Duke scouts a new passage through rough terrain. He meets a traveling preacher named Malachi Hobart during his trip. However, he soon discovers that Hobart is nothing more than a con man. Duke devises a plan to expose him.

programme.title: The Gun and the Pulpit
programme.desc: The captivating tale of a smooth-talking gunslinger posing as a preacher to hide from his enemies. He ends up bringing hope to his parishioners and law-and-order to a town terrorized by crooks.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E17 The Sixteenth Cousin The big day finally arrives in North Fork as the first train comes to town. Onboard are Lucas and Mark along with a Japanese nobleman and his servant. When bullies harass the foreign visitors, the pair quickly teaches them a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E17 The Sixteenth Cousin The big day finally arrives in North Fork as the first train comes to town. Onboard are Lucas and Mark along with a Japanese nobleman and his servant. When bullies harass the foreign visitors, the pair quickly teaches them a lesson in good manners.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E21 'Til Death Do Us Part Part 1 The Kid and Lou's special day is approaching, and the riders prepare for the couple's upcoming wedding. Teaspoon is upset over when the Army arrives in Rock Creek to recruit young men as scouts. Meanwhile, the townspeople brace for the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Pet Lucas and Mark find out a pony they adopted after the owner was killed may have anthrax. Fears of an epidemic rise in town. Meanwhile, the killer comes to the McCain Ranch thinking that Lucas has valuable information.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E16 The Sheridan Story At the end of the Civil War, General Sheridan and his staff arrive at the McCain Ranch. Trouble begins when ex-confederate soldier and hired hand Frank Blandon confronts the general, who shot and wounded him in the war.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Argonauts Cheyenne tries to help two prospectors locate a gold mine after Indians kill their partner, who knew the mine's location. Cheyenne finds the gold, but greed and distrust take over the prospectors, causing major issues.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger crosses paths with a frontier family traveling to the Wyoming Territory. He becomes the family's defender against a ruthless gang bent on taking all they have and robbing them of their dreams, lives, and futures.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: Miraculously still alive after his hanging, an aging gunfighter defends a young widow's farm from a vicious land grabber while confronting his troubled past.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.desc: Miraculously still alive after his hanging, an aging gunfighter defends a young widow's farm from a vicious land grabber while confronting his troubled past.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E3 Sheer Terror Lucas stands guard at the North Fork Bank when $50,000 arrives in a specially designed stagecoach strongbox. Two gunmem who plan to ambush and rob the stage take Milly and Mark hostage in the general store, which doubles as their headquarters.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E12 Final Cow Down, The During a long drought in lower Alabama, the cowboys have been chasing green grass throughout the surrounding area. Through new partnerships with other ranchers, they've finally ended up with a bumper crop of calves in north Alabama and a healthy herd in south Florida. Cody and Misty seek out the perfect high-value bull to build their growing cattle business, and they watch as their dream home finally takes shape. Bubba and Kaley welcome baby Ripp Walker Thompson into the world. Booger and Jaclyn surprise Grandma with a cowboy cookbook filled with her recipes and stories from life on the range.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S1 E1 Bubba, Cody and Booger It's another busy week in South Alabama for cowboys Bubba, Cody, and Booger. Rancher and expert carpenter Bubba Thompson races to build furniture and prepare his house for his soon-to-be wife, Kaley. Rodeo champion and cattle dealer Cody Harris is struggling to carry on after selling his prized rodeo horse in order to buy a home with his new wife, Misty. And, expert cattleman and horse trainer Booger Brown gets a life changing job offer he must consider. Despite their own worries, Booger and Bubba pitch in to buy a new colt for Cody in order to lift his spirits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E22 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E18 Matched Pair Jimmy reunites with Brad, an old friend and rival from his youth. They soon discover that Clara, the daughter of a man who was their mentor, is missing. In actuality, she ran away after finding out about her father's corruption.

programme.title: Rio Diablo
programme.desc: When a just-married couple is caught in the middle of a bank robbery, the bride is taken by the robbers. Now, the groom and a skilled bounty hunter search for the gang, hoping to find the bride alive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E25 The Prisoner When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E26 Assault Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E27 Short Rope for a Tall Man Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E28 The Clarence Bibs Story Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: Buck Commander
programme.desc: A group of former and current professional baseball players, along with a pair of country music stars, team up with outdoorsman, hunter and author Willie Robertson. Best known for his appearances on A&E's "Duck Dynasty," Robertson aids his co-owners of the Buck Commander Co. in the woods for deer season. Forming a bond and sharing a few laughs, Adam LaRoche, Ryan Langerhans, Tombo Martin, Luke Bryan and Jason Aldean use their signature tools to score big. Following the success of their company, the guys give viewers an inside look at the tools and knowledge of being a successful hunter.

programme.desc: A group of former and current professional baseball players, along with a pair of country music stars, team up with outdoorsman, hunter and author Willie Robertson. programme.title: Weekend Recharge
programme.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: (2015) Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance star in Steven Spielberg's Cold War spy drama. After gaining notoriety for defending a Soviet spy, a US lawyer then tries to free a CIA pilot.

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: (1973) Scorsese's classic crime drama about the ordinary lives of mafiosi - the boredom, casual violence and shattered dreams - in Little Italy, with Harvey Keitel and Robert De Niro.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: (2013) Dark psychological thriller. Jesse Eisenberg stars as a timid man whose drab existence takes a turn for the worse with the arrival of a new colleague at work. With Chris Morris.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: (1949) This dark comedy from Ealing studios sees Alec Guinness take on the roles of eight characters, all the noble victims of a vengeance-seeking relative, played by Dennis Price.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: (1943) Fact-based drama about a group of Merchant Navy sailors who brave fire and the ocean to save the San Demetrio oil tanker after it's almost destroyed by a German cruiser.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: (1951) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a rancher who's the target of unwelcome harassment by his richer and more powerful neighbour. With Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: (1956) Comedy with Katharine Hepburn and Bob Hope. A Russian captain defects to London, falls for the charms of Major Lockwood, and tries to convince him of the beauty of communism.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: (1989) Comedy-thriller starring Tom Hanks. A cop investigates a murder to which there's just one witness: Hooch, a slobbering, beer-drinking French mastiff, who now needs 24/7 protection.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: (2019) Luc Besson's action thriller about a young Russian assassin, with Sasha Luss. A scout offers Anna an opportunity to become a model in Paris, but can she escape her links to the KGB?

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: (2021) Horror with Ethan Hawke. Denver 1974 and The Grabber is snatching boys from the street. But he doesn't reckon on two kids with uncanny abilities who refuse to do as they're told.

programme.title: Berberian Sound Studio
programme.desc: (2012) Psychodrama with Toby Jones. An Englishman is hired to create sound effects for a horror film studio in 1970s Rome. But the job takes a heavy toll on him...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: (1997) Family fantasy comedy-adventure starring Jim Broadbent and Celia Imrie. A family of miniscule people live beneath the floorboards of a regular-sized family's house.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the...
programme.desc: ...Neighborhood: (2019) Biographical drama starring Tom Hanks as 'Mister' Rogers, the much-loved host of a kids TV show, who becomes the subject of a cynical journalist's article on heroes.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure starring Matt Damon and Willem Dafoe. In 11th-century China, Europeans seeking the secret of gunpowder are caught up in a war against alien monsters.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk
programme.desc: (2016) Wild West horror starring Kurt Russell, Lili Simmons, Patrick Wilson, Richard Jenkins and Matthew Fox. Can a posse save townsfolk from their cannibalistic abductors?

programme.title: In Fear
programme.desc: (2013) Psychological horror with Iain De Caestecker and Alice Englert. A couple get lost in remote rural lanes as they drive to a music festival. Frustration turns to fear as dusk falls...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out...
programme.desc: ...of Water: (2015) Surreal animated adventure. When the recipe for Mr Krabs' Krabby Patties vanishes, Bikini Bottom is plunged into anarchy. So SpongeBob sets out to put things right.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: (1954) Western with Robert Mitchum and Marilyn Monroe. An ex-con and a saloon singer steer a raft through hostile territory to face a showdown with her crooked fiancé. With Rory Calhoun.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: (1990) Classic family comedy starring Macaulay Culkin. A boy's parents forget to take him on holiday with them. Then two inept burglars turn up. Can our resourceful young hero outwit them?

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: (2019) Comedy drama starring Sharon Horgan and Kristin Scott Thomas. A group of military wives overcome their personal differences to form an unforgettable choir.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: (2011) Existentialist comedy-drama. Miranda July and Hamish Linklater play a couple whose directionless lives take an unexpected turn when they adopt a cat. Sex/strong language.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: Five daunting games and only one winning team... Will it be close friends Steve and Joe; Moona and Stephen or Amy and her father Rodney taking home £1,000?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: (1959) Western. Randolph Scott plays a bounty hunter who has unfinished business with the brother of his latest target. But his quest for revenge looks like it could be undermined.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: Yesterday's Enemy
programme.desc: (1959) Wartime drama with Stanley Baker. The captain of a British army patrol deciphers secret enemy battle plans, but does so at a great moral cost.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: (1993) Romantic comedy with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. A bereaved man gets another chance at love when his son puts him on a radio talk show.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise

programme.desc: Sci-fi action film sequel starring Peter Weller and Nancy Allen, 1990. RoboCop becomes embroiled in a scheme by Omni Consumer Products to bankrupt and take over Detroit.

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Donington Park GP featuring racing from The Vertu MINI CHALLENGE Trophy and the Porsche Carrera Cup Great Britain. S21 Ep23

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Ergo, the Booty Call: American sitcom about a rich bachelor. Alan avoids taking his 22-year-old girlfriend to Jake's birthday when he is worried about what Evelyn will make of her. S3 Ep16

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great Racehorses
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin introduces some of the great racehorses of the modern era from Nijinsky to Tiger Roll, plus Best Mate's third Gold Cup and Shergar racing to Derby glory.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Where the Money Is: Adventure series. Simon Templar agrees to act as a go-between by taking ransom money to the kidnappers of the wayward daughter of a rich film producer. S6 Ep9

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: The Trade-Off: Detective drama. When Captain McNeil's wife is kidnapped by a drug dealer, a letter that she has left for her husband may hold a clue to her whereabouts. S2 Ep24

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: I Want to Report a Dream: Detective drama. When a spiritualist has a vision of a woman being strangled, Theo seeks her help when a real murder occurs that matches her story. S2 Ep25

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Find Me A Rainbow: Classic US action drama series. When a rich woman hires Thomas to find a limo driver who allegedly stole jewellery from her, he uncovers a more unusual theft. S6 Ep15

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Who Is Don Luis Higgins... and Why Is He Doing These Terrible Things To Me?: Thomas is hired to guard the president of a small South American country. S6 Ep16

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: Out with the Old: US robot combat series. Tombstone has an enormous obstacle to success in the form of the gigantic Mammoth, and local Vegas hero Jackpot takes on Malice. S6 Ep7

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: A Question of Answers - Part One: Classic US detective drama. Theo makes a deal with a businessman facing prison to go undercover to help bring down a loan shark. S3 Ep1

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: A Question of Answers - Part Two: Classic US detective drama. When pressure mounts as the Feds renege on providing funds, Kojak feels responsible and sets a trap for the killer. S3 Ep2
